creator: 271759231@qq.com
chris@christopherschultz.net
text: Looks like you've got an invalid JAR file. Please confirm with a tool like info-zip, etc. that the file is in tact and readable on the server where you are getting this error.
Bugzilla is not a support forum. This question belongs on the users mailing list.
creator: markt@apache.org
